statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, preferences FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT full_name, age, address FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE preferences->>'category' = 'sports';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, full_name, age FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles_preferences WHERE preferences->>'theme' = 'dark' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, timezone FROM user_profiles ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT user_profiles.first_name, user_preferences.theme_mode FROM user_profiles JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_profiles.*, user_preferences.* FROM user_profiles, user_preferences WHERE user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, location FROM smart_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE language = 'English' AND timezone = 'UTC'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM smart_devices WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences INNER JOIN user_profiles ON user_preferences.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT theme, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM device_activity WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, da.activity_type FROM users u JOIN smart_devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN device_activity da ON d.device_id = da.device_id WHERE u.username = 'John' AND da.activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, up.theme FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT home_id, address FROM homes ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT device_id, name, type FROM devices WHERE type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT event_id, event_type, timestamp FROM events WHERE event_type='Alert' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM homes JOIN users ON homes.owner_id = users.user_id;
SELECT devices.name, preferences.setting_key, preferences.setting_value FROM devices JOIN preferences ON devices.device_id = preferences.device_id;
SELECT events.event_id, events.event_type, events.timestamp, devices.name FROM events JOIN devices ON events.device_id = devices.device_id ORDER BY events.timestamp DESC;
